item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started Follow Hugo Docs’s - Quick Start guide to install Hugo. (Make sure you install Hugo >= v0.112.4) Create a new Hugo site hugo new site MyFreshWebsite --format yaml # replace MyFreshWebsite with name of your website Note: Older versions of Hugo may not support --format yaml Read more here about Hugo Docs’s - hugo new site command After you have created a new site, follow the below steps to add MinimalBP
